mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT LVL, CAGO_ID, CAGO_NAME, UPCAGO_ID, SORT_ORDR, USE_YN, CAGO_ID_PATH, CAGO_NM_PATH, REGP_ID, REG_DTM, MODP_ID, MOD_DTM FROM ( SELECT LEVEL LVL, CAGO_ID, CAGO_NAME, UPCAGO_ID, SORT_ORDR, USE_YN, SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(CAGO_ID, '>'), 2) CAGO_ID_PATH, SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(CAGO_NAME, '>'), 2) CAGO_NM_PATH, REGP_ID, REG_DTM, MODP_ID, MOD_DTM FROM (SELECT * FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDCAGOXM WHERE DEL_YN = 'N') START WITH UPCAGO_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR CAGO_ID = UPCAGO_ID ) )

SELECT B.CAGO_ID , B.CAGO_NAME , B.UPCAGO_ID , (SELECT CAGO_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDCAGOXM A WHERE A.CAGO_ID = B.UPCAGO_ID ) UPCAGO_NAME , B.SORT_ORDR , B.USE_YN , B.REGP_ID , B.REG_DTM , B.MODP_ID , B.MOD_DTM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDCAGOXM B WHERE B.CAGO_ID = #{CAGO_ID} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
